definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: The knurled knob (GG) at the bottom end of the depth adjustment rod can be used to make minor adjustments.
sentences.chinese: 用深度调节杆底端的滚花柱头可以做细小调整。

sentences.english: This method improves the accuracy of small water-body picking-up.
sentences.chinese: 该方法有效的提高了细小水体提取的精度。

sentences.english: Will my dog die if he gets Parvo?
sentences.chinese: 如果我的狗感染了细小会死去吗？

sentences.english: Just over each temple there were little blue veins .
sentences.chinese: 就在两鬓太阳穴上面显露著青色的细小静脉。

sentences.english: The regenerating fibers were mainly small myelinated fibers.
sentences.chinese: 再生纤维主要为细小的有髓神经纤维。

sentences.english: I found some slick little trails out in our garden down under some tall hollyhocks.
sentences.chinese: 在花园里几株高高的蜀葵下面，我发现了细小的足迹。

sentences.english: Results show that the recycling agent can heal the small fracture in asphalt road.
sentences.chinese: 再生养护剂可使沥青路面上的细小裂缝基本愈合。

sentences.english: I asked, pointing to a thin, silvery creature.
sentences.chinese: 我指着一条细小银色的鱼问道。

sentences.english: Dynamic recrystallization takes place in the weld nugget zone and fine grains are achieved.
sentences.chinese: 焊核区发生动态再结晶，生成细小的等轴晶粒。

sentences.english: Appropriately increasing heat-retaining time can make MMC size fine.
sentences.chinese: 热处理保温时间的适当增长可使MMC组织变得细小。

sentences.english: Just those tiny serifs make sure there are thick and thin parts, like the 'e' has.
sentences.chinese: 就是这些细小的衬线让他有像“e”一样的粗细对比。

sentences.english: Fine drops of a liquid, such as water, perfume, or medication, sprayed into the air.
sentences.chinese: 喷雾细小的液滴，如水，香水或药剂被喷入空气中。

sentences.english: Its tiny flowers huddled together against the cold.
sentences.chinese: 它身上细小的花朵为了怕冷而挤在一起。

sentences.english: Sweat gland: Either of two types of perspiration glands in the skin.
sentences.chinese: 汗腺以外，皮肤还包含其他的细小泌腺，叫做皮脂腺。

sentences.english: Of panes of glass fixed in place by means of thin strips of lead .
sentences.chinese: 用细小的铅条来固定在适当的位置上。

sentences.english: The microstructure consists of fine-scale columnar and equiaxed grains.
sentences.chinese: 显微结构由细小柱晶和等轴晶构成。

definition: veined pattern/wrinkles/vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
